item.title: üê∏ Summoning a Frog
item.description: Summoning Shrine for a Frog The ritual should be performed on a rooftop or mezzanine. For maximum efficiency, please begin the ritual at night, when the stars are bright and when clouds are causing rain to fall upon earth.

item.title: üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Garden Spellbook
item.description: There are many magical things that happen in the garden. Some of them are triggered by rituals that need to be performed over a longe period of time (eating a specific bread bun, over a year), others are momentary actions (like closing your eyes, tilling your head and remembering the moment) yet others are simply about enjoying the moment (letting rain fall on your face).
